llm_enhanced_instruction: Now that your empty database is open, click the “+ Add a property” button at the far right of the column header row to add a new column, which will let you define another field such as Status or Due date.
llm_context: A small property menu opens with a name field and type options (Text, Number, Select), and an untitled column appears in the table—you're now one step closer to building your database structure.
